title: display
description: Is it possible to display in the board of an entity a foreign key item reference ? For example if I have an entity called warehouse that references another entity called Product with a relation of type ManyToOne, how can I display in the view of the Product entity the foreign key reference to the Warehouse? I hope my question is clear enough. Thanks for your help.

replies.body:
Hi Carlos,

please put your question in the Help forum of OpenXava:
In English:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/openxava/forums/forum/419690

Or in Spanish:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/openxava/forums/forum/437013
